events.message: I received the wrong jacket and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I ordered.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund category due to their request for money back.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the customer's refund case regarding the incorrect jacket.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund for your order, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide a photo of the jacket you received along with your order number to start the refund process?
Attached are the photos of the jacket I got, which is clearly different from the one I ordered, and here is my order number 123456.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited to your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and solution. I appreciate your help with getting the refund processed so fast.
The refund has been confirmed processed on our end. Please notify us if you do not receive it in 5 business days.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and are satisfied with how your case was handled.
Closing this case now as the refund was successfully delivered and no further action was requested by the customer.
